text: "All My Rowdy Friends (Have Settled Down)" is a 1981 song by Hank Williams Jr. and is the leading single from his 33rd studio album The Pressure Is On. It topped the country singles on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart and Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Country songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs
title: All My Rowdy Friends (Have Settled Down)
